SNMP ORBAN8700-MIB - orban

Available versions


  • ver. 5.0
  • ver. 5.4


SNMP ORBAN8700-MIB - orban

Description

Generated by mib2zabbix

Overview

SNMP template for ORBAN Optimod 8700 monitoring.

Items and traps:

  • AES and Analog Input active/off
  • AES and Analog Input silence
  • AES Input Error
  • Power Supply 1 and 2 active/off
